values:
i have a secret desire to be one of those hip livejournal, or blogs everyone is into. honestly i don't have a fan base. figures.

yesterday i attended a friend's wedding shower. it was awkward at first, but it was a good time. i've been good friends with her since grade 10 and although we don't see each other often i really consider her a good friend, she's just so easy to talk to. 

i'm sitting here at work, bored and listless. everyone is gone today but me. i have the lucky job of being the department today. 

tonight i will make dinner and watch tv. no wonder i don't have a fanbase. my life is ass.

good afternoon.

i am actually keeping my goal of writing frequently which is nice. even if no one reads this i don't care its for my own personal reflection.

my email was busted earlier this week, i hope i did not miss any emails. i'm scared i lost the one i am putting so much thought and effort into.

yesterday i did meet up with gillian. i got to see her new beach pad. very nice! we got some food at this hip cafe and went to the beach! first time going to the beach this summer! very exciting. we ate on a log and chatted. the sun was shining perfectly but it was a tad windy. i saw a beautiful eagle flying over us. picture perfect british columbia i must say. i did not notice until now that sand got into my purse! ha! we then went back to her place to watch tv and chat. good evening, gillian is really starting to become a good friend. we have so much in common it's crazy. i'm glad she was my assistant and i got the chance to know her throughout the process of the show. 

as for tonight we are going for ukrianian dinner. then perhaps i'll return all the movies i rented, get some beer and relax.

i also seem to have lost connact with an old friend nicholas. i don't know how i'll get into connact with him anymore.

the topic makes no sense. i guess its just my way to try and seem more interesting.

i've been really good lately seeing old friends. its been great, although sometimes i feel i'm growing apart from them. i talked to an old friend last night and they told me to email my prof regarding my grade. i did last night and still no response. i don't think i'll ever get one. i'm sad that he doesn't care, i'm sad that i care way too much. double edge sword. i'm suppose to meet up with my friend gillian tonight. she's great so much fun.

i have a movie to watch. finding neverland better watch it soon! well there's no food in the house so it looks like i'll be getting subway again.

3 days in a row.. meh could be worse.

i get discouraged really easily. especially by people whom i admire, people who i want encouragement from and praise. i was already hurt by his actions earlier (read previous post). why should i be suprised this time?

i think its because i'm ugly or fat. that's what i tell myself, because i don't want to believe that i'm terrible at what i do. he just gives the pretty girls what they want. the ugly ones are less valueable to him. i want to not believe that because i've seen his wife. she looked nothing like i expected her to look like. 

i'm the worst of the best? in a class of 90s i get an 85. i know he didn't look at the others work. they laughed when they were told by him that they were going to receive A+ and he walked away. i knew he didn't look at my work i didn't want to settle for that, i paid for the class mark my work. i wanted him to see the work that i worked so hard on. it's worth 85% less than the others work he didn't look at.

i'm sad and discouraged. he emailed me telling me to attend something. i don't want to go, i don't want to email him back. i know if i go i'll be more discouraged. i don't want to break my will anymore.

my heart is broken and so is my trust.

i'm quite upset this evening. i guess its because sometimes i feel left out and when it something happens to confirm my feeling it doesn't add to my confidence. tonight i feel like quitting school. i'm the stupid fat kid that doesn't belong again and everything confirms my feeling. the situation you ask? well i'll tell you.

back in september i was assigned to assist my advisor and my professor for a set design. i felt, hey i must be good he's assigning me himself, right? i was in the loop receiving emails etc. i was feeling like this was a real job, that it was important that i was there. there were 4 other assistants also, which from looking back on it i should of noticed that i was not significant in this whole bullshit i was there for free labour (literally). i go to meetings i spend time doing things etc.. feeling good about myself. he told me i was going to be paid, me and two other assistants, he told me i'd be paid. today in front of 2 other assistants he told them about 'their' cheques and to pick them up. i stood there almost waiting for something to be said because i believed it. nothing, i leave almost heart broken. almost like it was stupid for me to even be there. i dont want to anymore, i don't even want to try. i feel like saying fuck it and quiting school. 

i don't believe in this department anymore, my trust is broken.

i feel stuck sometimes. i'm in a situation that probably could be blamed on my own actions but it is because they were interpreted wrong by someone. how to fix this sort of situation? do you ignore it in hopes it will fade, do you try and fix it even though there's no point anymore. i think i opt for the first option, you can only care so much especially when the person isn't worth your time. but how am i suppose to react when someone who knows me believes these things as well and doesn't response when hearing these things in the manner i expect every friend to react. do i ignore this? can i ignore this? 

i guess sometimes i'm too pushy, but i believe in the whole 'people can better themselves' maybe i should make myself better first. i'm just some stupid fat ugly kid. 

i think it's easier to hate people then to love people. when you hate someone you expect the worse in every situation that way you won't get punched in the face when the shit hits the fan. 

i can't believe he didn't react. i can believe he thinks this is how i am. he always thought i was selfish. i feel used. i feel unknown and lost. i'm hurt.

i don't think he can make it better because the time is gone and he didn't react.

well those who know me are aware of my love for green day. i've adored the band since my younger teen days and have continued being a fan during there progress into a wonderful band. i adore the new album, i don't think i can stress this enought. anyways.

well today was unlike any other day? why you might ask? well i am updating and i rarely due. my life has been filled with shit at school because of the show i designed, but i don't want to bore with the gory details of why you shouldn't attend ubc for a theatre program.

today at noon (12:15 ryan was late). we left for lynwood washington. green day was doing a signing at 5pm. it took about 2.5 hours to get there. we get into line and they run out of wristbands so we are not promised to meet them. well fuck, a hole day wasted. we wait in line for 2 hours which seem like forever and we get in. its surreal being so close to people that you admire. i almost lost my shit standing there, i had to contain myself and keep composure so i could say what i wanted to say. it was a quick meet and greet no pictures with the band, no personalized signatures (which was ok i already had there autographs). i get close and figure hell, here goes nothing. i look billie in the eye and say hi, i want to thankyou for your music, it means a lot to me and helped me get through some tough times. he seemed humbled by the comment probably better them some of the shit he heard from those 13 yearold twats. anyways, tre joked with me and mike spoke to me about the album art and told me about the new video. i said thankyou to mike and left.


so yeah.

the day i met green day.

this is totally another drunken update.
i drink mainly on weekends due to the fact my job is boring but i need to work it to pay my tutition. i like my boss though he's a good guy. 

we are moving again. i hate where we live, and i dont like having a roomate. i guess it bugs me to live with someone else. maybe its not the person entirely its just living with ryan is enough to make me mad why do i need someone else to take care of/clean up after. the new apartment is beautiful and modern, its near my sister's and its THE BEST THING EVER.
i found it online and OMG YAY!

so yeah im going to the states tomorrow to buy stuff... yay!

i said i was going to leave this journal. that was imature. instead im going to write... more then ever perhaps? i have nothing better to do i work 9am-5pm everything why not write?
actually i leave 30 minutes early cause no one notices. ha !!

well, i miss my highschool days i really do. i miss my friends especially gina and joey. we did some crazy things and i miss that. when did i grow up? how the hell did i get into UBC? i'll graduate one day, some day that day when day.

sometimes i totally feel great about my life. other days its like whoa what i am i doing with my life. i'm already 21 thinking about life goals? what the hell shouldn't i be stupid and partying 24/7? when did i get responsible? or am i even responsible? im completely different then i was in 2000 and it bugs the hell out of me. but then again i still do stupid things and spend large amounts of money on things i do not really need. for example i dropped 450 dollars on an ipod... do i need an ipod NO? do i want an ipod? i GUESS SO! it should be here monday, i am excited mainly because i like getting mail and waiting for it to come... that's all really. ryan will probably play with it more then i do. 

we are moving again? what the fuck? well it seems this place is dumb expensive and far away. beside we dont want to live with tyler anymore before we start hating each other more then we already do. its lame really, you never know people until you live with them. lame i know.

my sister is in toronto visiting my parents. some days i really miss them.. a lot. i miss my mom i miss spending time with her. its lame i feel alone here, its nice to have my sister here... but it feels like i have no reason to stay in vancouver sometimes even though i love it here. when i finish school i may move.. stupid UBC stuck there for 2 more years.. lame!

i've been drinking i apologize for the random post. i totally need more livejournal friends...


oooooo

ooo

ooo

ooo
ooo
ooo


oo

ooo
poo

i'm really lame lately.
i think i'm gonna leave this journal
..


goodbye

well we moved and are still in the process of doing so. it's amazing how much junk ryan has. i'm happy to say my stuff is all here and pretty much in the right place. i really hate moving, remind me why i did this again?

it's exam time again, my first one is tomorrow. can't really study for an english exam since it's all essays and stuff so no studying was done. i did study for french thought, which i am doing this friday.

tomorrow is the portfolio review for my program. well i bet i suck, but atleast i can compare my work to other students. i really do not have much to show so it's going to be a pitiful display. 

i go to toronto soon, and yeah... school is going to be done on the 21st after my last exam. i bet i did shit ass this semester but whatever. i am a B average for this entire year and so far that's what i got.

meh.

this whole time change thing is weird. it feels early but its late and now i gotta get up earlier what is that junk? i do enjoy it being light out later. today was ok. we went to the new place and dropped off boxes of my stuff. i feel very unprepared to move and well we are suppose to move by the 10th.

wish me luck?

i've been really bad with homework lately. tomorrow i must work on my 25 drawings for my design class and i also must start my rendering (ok i may wait awhile to do this ha!). good thing the only real homework i have is all my design stuff, stuff i sorta like doing.

this essay is taking forever.

also i need/want a new nose stud someone till me where to get one.

today went well, more well than others. i'm getting the hang of this university thing which is cool. meeting people making friends, doing lame homework. sometimes i feel lost and sometimes i feel found. 

we did a group presentation in my science class today, it went rather well. the teacher said my video was beautiful, i'm glad i could contribute something to the group. the semester is ending soon, i'm rather proud i survived.

i move soon, i hate moving. i also hate living in this dump.

i'm really angry today. i guess its a combination of my job, stress and people i know. i'm moving, well me and ryan, and his friend is going to move in with us. i have mixed feelings about this so i guess i'm angry because i have something new to worry about. i just know he's going to be taken advantage of and not get money for rent etc.. i know it'll drive me nuts cause i hate it when people take advantage of him. i really don't know what to do, but i want to scream. i just hope it will work out.

lots of stuff has happend since i last updated. i wish i updated more but sometimes the effort is too much. my parents left for toronto. so far so good i guess, beside the fact me and ryan fight like crazy. keeping myself busy is key, but now i want to do nothing and wish i didn't have to work. 

i cut my hair this weekend. i really like it, makes me look less messy. i should take a picture but i haven't. my hair is pretty much its natural colour now. nice. i also got my nose pierced it's cute.

friday night was good. i've been working on a film for the last couple of weeks. and it was to "so called" wrap party. it was bowling, which was lame. but we went to the bar afterwards. this is very unlikely of me to go out with people i barely know but i had a lot of fun. i really hope i keep up these friendships.... i know i'm shitty at this, because i'm shy and lazy. 

i need to go to school tomorrow for essay help, lame. i also need to find a neat painting to do a set design to. wish me luck.


ps. i miss my mom sometimes, don't tell anyone.

i'm having troubles lately, not grasping the idea of being grown up. i feel lost most of the time. school is bland, i don't know what i'm getting from it really. my parents leave soon, it's really starting to bother me. i don't look on the bright side, never have. i don't know about ryan and i. i'm busy for the next 3 weekends, shitty but whatever. 

i got no one.

hi dudes,

i watched world idol today, jumped right on the bandwagon. i'm a sucker for reality tv even though it's killing the industry i want to be employed in later in life. yes, i admit i watch the simple life with paris hilton.

today was alright, nice to sleep-in. didn't do much during the day. i went out for sushi with my sister and ate myself silly. homer is playing with ryan he is really cute.

i work tomorrow, should be a slow day or atleast i hope. i really hate the stupid people that call in. seriously if you are calling a government department please know what you are looking for, it's all i ask. i hate it when i have to explain things to people, i feel like 411 sometimes giving out correct numbers. who am i? the fucking telephone operator, why call us? WHY? can you tell i'm angry??????? and then when i ask people simple questions about their job/industry they are like "i dunno" well how the fuck should i know? i'm only asking to see if you've called the right place now FUCK OFF.

don't call the labour department, seriously we don't cover you unless you are a federal department or federal regulated and mcdonalds isn't.

thanks!

looking back 2003 wasn't that bad, i could even say i enjoyed the most of it. i just wish things could stay the same sometimes. i have a feeling 2004 isn't going to be a good year. year in review: last semester at douglas college - great time, a lot of fun memories. Making a music video, stupid jokes, and being so tired but having so much fun. graduating - i actually managed to graduate, proud momment for my parents and for me. getting accepted to UBC - didn't think i would, big shock. working back with the government - kind of a copp out job but good money and i didn't do much work. getting homer - one of the best things that has ever happend to me. starting school at UBC - scary, i still don't feel like i belong. my birthday - i didn't do anything, go figure. i went for a lovely japanese dinner with my family. my father getting transfered to toronto - well that's some news you don't want to hear. christmas 2003 - it was ok, i love spending time with my mom. new years - watched tv with ryan and homer, my two boys. i didn't do much this year it seems. i guess i'm a boring person. 2004... starting off with my parents moving. i guess being more independant will make me become more interesting. we also want to move this year. goals for 2004 get decent grades keep decent job move to north burnaby - to a two bedroom aparment that allows dogs get another dog visit parents - a lot pierce nose - still deciding this keep stuff cleaner - i need ryan's help with this eat healthier think positive try and contact and see old friends don't let being afraid stop me from doing stuff grow up

waiting for ryan to come back and i'm hungry. sucks to be me. if i was smart i'd be studying but alas i am not and i hate the idea of it at the momment. i don't really have much to say. Homer is being annoying..  what else is new.

i never update anymore. i've stated this in a lot of my reccent (well not really reccent) posts. maybe i should give up this journal thing, because truely who cares. i dont want to seem whiney and bitch about giving up my journal like other people, whose websites i read. i just see how i neglect this journal so much. maybe i'll just make more of a decision to update, and hopefully i'll gain friends in the process. i feel lonely in the world of the internet.

school is almost finished, two exams left french and drama. i'm not too worried about drama and french freaks me out, but hey if i was so freaked out i'd be studying right now. i wrote an exam wednesday afternoon, i studied my butt off and it seemed i didn't need to once i wrote the exam, sure i knew dates and important people but the other stuff was relevant to the rest of the exam. when i was done i turned to nicole and said i wasted 24 hours of my life reading over 10 plays for an exam which didn't even mention one. ugh.. hours of my life i'll never get back. i don't know what my mark will be like in this class, the teacher is a hard marker.. can i have a B please?

today was nice, saw some friends watched tv. ate drank and was merry. my friend is in town, she came back from working on cruiseships. it's weird i feel weird around her i don't know how to explain it really. it just doesn't seem like i have anything to contribute to the converstation when we talk because when we used to talk we had everything in common, and now we don't? she's here till jan. 5th hopefully i'll see her again and things will be ok. 

christmas is lurking, and my bank account is crying. my parents might be moving to toronto, honestly i don't know what to make of us this right now. i'm so busy with everything i feel like when the realization does hit me i'll have a nervous breakdown.. figures. i used to wish i was busy cause i was so bored out of my mind, now i yearn for a day i can fuck off... school is so demanding and i feel like i'm just one of a million trying to do the same thing. sucky..

hopefully i can get some good studying in tomorrow for french class. i figure i'll study at school for a few hours then study on saturday before the test. yes, that's right the exam is 7pm on saturday, LAME!! i have to work 3 full days at work next week, it's gonna kill me because i haven't done it since the summer. i cant imagine being there that long 4 hours seem too long. i need the money.

here i go updating.
right now im watching tv during my break from school. class was semi interesting today, sometimes i just want to leave even though they are an hour long. i'm never happy, one thing that ticks me off is my theatre history teacher is real shitty at marking stuff.. so i don't even know if im doing ok in that class.. ah.. well..

work is boring so is school. i like my dog.. do i really need to elaborate?

i never update anymore, maybe it's because my life sucks i never have anything to talk about, or i'm lazy.

(i think it's just the later)

so yeah... i go to school at UBC who da thunk eh? 

im kinda drunk
maybe more later.. ok i'll update more i need more friends

everything is fine, i have to call arts advising today cause i'm an overeacting freak and i want to make sure they entered my lpi mark. school is going ok, nothing too too overwhelming i hope i can get an 80 average... i'm not aiming for as high as i did last year cause it's just so different this year. 

i'm going to seattle this weekend i'm excited. i get to use ryan's credit card so purchase new shoes for my b'day. then i'm going to get makeup and other fun things. 

class was interesting today, i'm quite interested in native theatre i think i may head in that direct with my schooling. work with the native community and be a designer.. who knows..

i'm hungry.

well, i haven't updated in months. i guess it's because my life is boring and i figure no one cares anyways. i don't think anyone read my journal anyways but i'll make a bit of an update for the hell of it.

homer is doing good. i love this dog more then life, the amount of joy he brings me outweighs any of bad things he does. he's getting so big last time we check he was 13 pounds.

i start school, yes that's right UBC let me in. it's overwhelming, i feel like i'm too stupid to be there. i always doubt myself but everything will be ok. i am still working and will be till february. i got a raise so that rocks.

ryan and i have been together for 4 years September 10, 2003.

gosh.. update more.. should i?

Ryan's mom came and left. I've spent horrendous amounts of money and my summer job is fun and lame at the same time. Now what you ask? Well there's some big news kids! First off i'm moving! Ryan and I are moving to the downstairs apartment which has a large patio (large meaning, large for a city apartment). I'm rather excited but i hate moving and cleaning. This'll be good for us, i'm happy. I also go a puppie! We got him last Saturday, it was such a spur of the momment thing. We've been talking about getting a dog forever. We looked in the classifieds called about an add, and hour or so later we had Homer. Homer is a purebreed Beagle. He's happy, hyper and sleepy. His bark is so cute and he keeps me very VERY busy. My entire life consists of Homer right now. I love my puppie. I hope ya'll are doing fine. Although I never comment I always read your journals. <3 Christina

this is rather accurrate...
violatedviolet
Magic Number12
JobConservationist
PersonalityA Worrier, I Worry That I Worry Too Much
TemperamentPussy Cat
SexualIf I Have To
Likely To WinA Nobel Prize
Me - In A WordCompassionate
Colour
Brought to you by MemeJack

i havent updated in awhile. i think i should update more mainly because i forget everything i do.

i graduated from douglas on thrusday, the ceremony was alright except for dying heat. i had to peel my ass off my chair. 7 people from my program graduated.. heh we rock! next step UBC. goodness me!
i went to UBC on saturday to write a test for english placement, i dunno how i did. i am afraid. 

work is alright, im pretty bored. i do my work too fast and waste most of my day. come tomorrow all the back log will be done and i'll have nothing to do. sucks.. i think i may tell my boss i need more projects, she's not gonna be around this week. sucks to be me. 

tomorrow will be lame, i am lame.. everyone is lame. help me.

work was weird today, i arrived around 8:20am and was told that one of the engineers i worked with last summer had passed away. it was rather sad news everyone around the office was upset. 

death is weird to me, the concept of never seeing that person again scares me. 

i paid my deposit for UBC today, weird.. i gotta call em and set up an academic advising meeting, i didnt want to today cause things were weird. im also training.. all day. 

i dunno what's next. you tell me.

i never pictured myself making this entry. i'm so secretive lately and lying to close friends to protect myself. i really don't know how to explain it but i am ashamed of my actions. i feel better now and i won't make up excuses and lie. 

i don't expect to ever get anything, or deserve anything. i assume the worst because it hurts less when the shit hits the fan. i've been rejected so many times and i've been a loser for awhile now, so why would i expect good things to happen to me? 

i did shitty in highschool had no direction at all, took a year off and was a bum, i pretty much hated myself. then i went to douglas and took this silly stagecraft program i never thought i'd be good at. i did pretty good, i was ok. i got a good summer job, but the comfy program at douglas ended and i was stuck being a loser again. i've only been out of school for a month mind you but it's exactly how i felt. i got my job back i was happy but sadden i had no idea what was going on come september.

on may 5th i had an interview with the head of the theatre design program at UBC and it went well, he told me i'd be good enough to get it. but i still hadnt recieved my letter of acceptance to UBC so i assumed i sucked and they didn't want me. 

i applied late sent stuff late, and i never get my shit together on time.

i got the letter today, i'm in.

now ask myself what's next?

well i haven't updated lately. things are going well, better then i had previously mentioned. i don't want to jink things so i won't discuss them quiet yet.

i got two wisdom teeth pulled out on tuesday and im hanging out at my parents. which is boring but also nice at the same time. i hope to start working soon, i'm rather anxious to start making money and daytime tv is starting to SUCK royally. i watch too many re-runs and soap operas.

i'm not going to see ryan till saturday. just felt like staying here longer.

i feel a bit better about things. got some stuff planned got some back-up plans and such.

just hope everything works ok?

i hate going into detail but all this stuff concerns schooling pretty much. i do have a summer job on the condition i'm returning to school. so is that a good thing? hope so?


bah

i hate my life.

i don't feel like going into further detail.

i don't know how to feel lately. i think i'll go into hidding and not see anyone but ryan and my family for awhile. just my feelings lately. although i have to visit work people next week. which is fine i do want my old job back and pray to god i get it, i just hope i don't have to go to another interview to get it again. i hate job interviews. i need money to cut my hair i feel its long and flat and ugly. my sickness is getting better but i have this god awful cough now, i wish it'd go away. 

love me?

i plan on updating more so i don't forget my days, but i will anyways. 

today i went to school and saw my friends. we gossiped (of course) and talked about the party on saturday. i've decided i most likely will not be going, i'm pooped! 

tonight me and ryan played trival pursuit at dave's house, somehow i managed to be tied with first place then we split into teams so we'd finish faster. so this worked to my advantage even more. the final question had to do with my family's canadian native history who woulda thunk! ryan got it.

tomorrow i think im going to that lame auto show with ryan and dave. im going to sit in every damn car i can so i will feel special. i also have to type up some of my research stuff for my art project. boo hiss!

I graduate in June, yay me getting my school papers for university in order. might as well try, correct?
I've been partying too much lately too many late nights drinking with school mates and the teacher(!) let's say there's now a huge flashing red X on him. he dry humped my friend (don't ask)
i finally dyed my hair dark purple, i like it a lot. painting this semester was good i hope i get like straight A's this semester to bump up my gpa higher *crosses fingers*
i saw judy's baby finally, she's so cute and tiny and wonderful.
my thoart hurts a lot right now and i should be sleeping.
i have a huge assignment due next friday (one week tomorrow eeekk!)
my father is in LA
i am in vancouver with ryan whom i NEVER spend time with any more.
there's a party on saturday but i don't think i need to drink 3 weekends in a row. correct?
i want/need to cut my hair.
i NEED to get my summer job in line SOON ASAP!!
i need to purchase new shoes because my runners are covered in paint from painting the show.
the funniest thing ever happend greg dumped paint on himself. oh man!
i really need to update more so many things happen that i WANT to remember later in my life but im so damn lazy it seems. 
i guess i can't complain.

i feel i should update because so much has happend these last few days. i don't even know how to write about everything, but it's unimportant anyways, right?

i feel fine.

just.. not right.

well it's probably about time i actually updated, although i'm sure no one was sitting at the edge of their desk awaiting a post. i haven't been too busy, lazy most likely. i have no motivation lately, just fear which is somewhat of a motivation. i graduate from my program soon and this leaves me uneasy with future prospects. but, naturally i never know what the future holds for me just like i didn't last year. walking blindly with my eyes shut. i would like to get my degree.. i think(?) 

i have to paint for the show tomorrow. it'd be good if i actually knew which colours to paint stuff, but the designer is always absent. i figure he'll be absent tomorrow, although i have phoned him and left a message. so tomorrow i'll be blindly painting stuff hoping it looks "ok". 

i need to stick to my diet better 16 pounds is all i've lost. i NEED to lose more. i am unhappy but i will never be content. i love buying clothing lately and my bank account shows it. i got neat shoes and jean capris. very hip i'm told. i need a haircut and some hairdye and something to be pierced. like my nose or lip, but i'm too chicken and "afraid" of job prospects with piercings.

news flash:

I SUCK.

all about the death decay as my friends would put it.

so everything is fine with school, still avoiding homework. still having a blast. we are making a *REAL* music video for my stagecraft for tv and film class. we have an actual band which is good, i'm the scenic artist and props person. i still feel unadequent though. i always do.

tonight was strange, but in a good way. i saw two old highschool friends. jasmine and robin we hung out went for dinner went for coffee and chatted. everythings changed, it's almost insane. they both are doing good and look real good too. im amazed how much gossip i got tonight, it seems everyone has gotten no where or they are pregnant. like half of the girls had babies! people are married.. and then there's me.

i guess i am gonna find my place within this world. 

somewhere.. who knows..

does anyone else feel like they want to disappear?

i don't know what i want to do anymore.

well here's another update.
i lost 8 pounds nice.
i am so confused about school although i applied for SFU. and i "thinking" of UBC.
i hate everything.
i suck.
school is hard.
i should fail and die.
i want blue hair.
someone to make everything better.

what's wrong with me? i used to think i knew what i was doing. now i don't anymore. what am i good at?

home alone on a saturday night, how cool am i? seriously?

ryan went out to his friend's to watch the hockey game and i decided not to follow along. so i'm watching tv and playing with my makeup. school starts on monday and i dunno about this semester. i have mixed feelings but i normally do. i'm thinking about dying my hair another darker colour. blueish purple? black? i got no idea. 

so many decisions i have no make within the year 2003. 2002 was good for me suprisingly. and i hope 2003 will be. 

highlights of 2002 (in no particular order):

- for the majority school was good and i got good marks
- got a good summer job which paid a lot for me to do nothing
- made money!
- met new friends 
- saw paul mccartney
- went to the boston museum of art
- me and ryan are still together.. 3 years and um.. 5 months 
- i'm happy?

i don't have much else to say. ryan will be back probably around 10. and i'm just gonna sit around and watch tv and surf the net. i should do a million other things but i would rather not.

i've been meaning to update for awhile but i just haven't. i love reading everyones journals though. anyways


christmas came and went and so did new years. i go back to school on monday and i gotta start figuring out next year and im afraid. i guess it's time i focus on stuff. i feel sorta weird writing about things here cause all it seems is that i bitch all the time.

anyways maine was ok, boston was fun. and i like the presents ryan got me. i wanna dye my hair blue. sounds like fun?

nobody loves me anymore.

i never get any comments! pfft..

it's nice having this month of no school and no work. although i spend way too much money on stuff. me and ryan leave on the 22nd to go to maine. christmas makes me sad for some reason im not terribly happy though. i want a neat t-shirt that's all i ask for!!

cutt all my hair and now its dark purple..

like whoa!

well school is over and i don't even know where to begin from where i left off last month. this last week was pure hell week filled with 4 hours of sleep at night and 10 hour days at school. around tuesday i decided i hated everyone, and i still hate a remaining few. i don't know what i did in everything, and part of me doesnt care  because it was such hell to get here. part of me is jealous too, if i'd only be better. i think i just need a break then decided whereabout i will go to in a year. but january comes soon and so does decisions of schooling next year. i dont know how to describe my gut feeling of failure. it's weird i've never felt it before till this last week. almost like jealously is taking over my life. what's wrong with me? 

yesterday my final construction project was done. it was hellish to get there. the class went to boston pizza after for drinks and such. i don't like anyone but a few so it was lame and i didn't really wanna go in the first place cause i am rather anti-social. i can always keep my humour about me but lately i see myself losing grip. hating people i love and just not being there out of spite. 

i just need a month off. i think all my feeling will disappear. i go to maine soon and i have mix feelings about it. not sure whether to like it or not because i like my family and my home for christmas. someone be me instead.

yet again a long time has passed since my last update. the show started and ended. it was great, and everything is fine now. school is ending soon, finally a break. i'm gonna cut my hair and dye it purplish colour probably. 

lots have happend lately, but then again i don't what to write anymore cause no one comments anyways. i gotta go into school tomorrow, and then do homework tomorrow night and monday. not much to do really some audio stuff and lighting. atleast there's no drafting due. 

ryan starting buying some of my christmas gifts online today i got a few things but sephora.com doesnt use canadian credit cards! i'm crushed i wanted so many things from there! now i guess i'll go downtown to the bay and sears to get some neat makeup there and stuff. i also want the almost famous dvd. 

my eyes hurt, i may go back to wearing glasses or atleast have both. contacts arent always fun especially when your tired. 

tomorrow feels like a pj pant day. and lay around day.

someone leave me a comment and assume me.. pretty please?

yesterday was opening night. everything went great. i got shitfaced with everyone.

meh, only live once.

i never update, my life is random days filled with school, friends and tv. although i am content.
